description: A dataset is a type of view defined by a flat list of entities.

items.description: The flat list of file entity references that define this dataset.  Limit: 30K items.

size.description: The cumulative size, in bytes, of all items(files) in the dataset. This will be automatically computed by service.

checksum.description: The checksum is computed over a sorted concatenation of the checksums of all items in the dataset. For example, if a dataset contains two files with the following checksums: file1.md5 = 72794b6d and file2.md5 = 5e089d29. Then the checksum of the dataset is: md5('5e089d29,72794b6d') = f7a29a04.  This will be automatically computed by service.
